data.detailed_description:
The twenty-second DLC for the game Coloring Game 4. The theme of this DLC is a picture of 32 color palettes.

Size: 15 images / 400,000px
Duration: 8 hours (Pen Mode) / 4 hours (Fill Mode)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 512MB)
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
